name: R.O.B (Lucas LEPLAT)
description:
Your experiment failed. Your furnace turned into a living thing, named R.O.B (Raging Obliterating Bot)

Feed the R.O.B with the right components, while avoiding its attacks to save your life !

Controls :

  • WASD : Move
  • Spacebar : Jump
  • Left Click : Pick up items / give resources to R.O.B

Team : 

Lucas LEPLAT : Game Designer, FX Artist & Main Developer

Lison RICHOUX : Character Designer & Environement Artist

Chloé BORGNET : 2D Artist

Cedric MEVEL : Level Designer & Developer

Quentin MEVEL : Environement Artist & Developer

Aurélien MONTERO : Sound Design
